model.moves

Class Move<G extends Game>

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.fsm.Transition<G>
      • model.moves.Move<G>
  • Type Parameters:
    G - the game on which the move can be played.

    public abstract class Move<G extends Game>
extends Transition<G>
    Represents an abstraction of a move.

    Celia Cacciatore - Raphael Bauduin
